name: [Group16] Olympunch
description:
Welcome to Olympunch, a fast-paced, physics-based game, where you knock your godly opponent out of Olympus with a powerful punch to emerge victorious. Swing around obstacles with a grappling hook  to gain momentum and increase your velocity for a better chance of defeating the opposition and becoming the victorious ruler of the skies!

We have a hard working team of individuals creating this project to bring you a great  gaming experience. We have our developers Diogo and Rafi, both  programmers in C++ that  follow the Game Development course. They are working together to ensure that the game's mechanics run smoothly. Meanwhile, Liese, Dennis, and Sunniva, our talented artists in Game Graphic Production, are creating stunning graphics that will transport you into the game's immersive world. Get ready for an exciting game of Punch Party, where every punch counts!

Specifications:

  • PvP party game
  • Greek mythology themed
  • Top down slanted camera angle
  • Stylized
